Screw you for making me install 7-zip just for this. WinRAR refused to open the multipart 7-zip file that this is. Got it extracted finally. Ugh.

Can't for TPTB to release the update 1. It's utterly obnoxious that the update is 3+ GB in size, just because of the fucking bloated cutscenes. Who gives a flying fuck about the cutscenes. 720p is more than enough.

Fucking PC games these days... bloated pieces of turds, the opposite of what one would expect from modern games. Judging by this trend, I guess 20 years from now we'll all be watching a 500GB still image from our monitors, pretending it's a game, instead of actually playing anything. And we'll receive 600GB patches to that image because one or two pixels are not quite the right color.

I may sound cranky but I am grateful deep down. Thank you for this release.
Disregard. I suck donkey cocks. The cutscene files are not to blame for the update size.
